website_summaries.verdict: This jacket is built to accommodate harnesses, while other jackets only have openings for leashes.
pros: Double layered zip up raincoat with additional buttons makes coat adjustable
Multiple pockets for storage of small items
Comes in a variety of sizes
Protects belly better than poncho styles
cons: Zipper can get caught in belly hair

customer_reviews.title: Not bad..
customer_reviews.text: Not bad...more stylish than actually protective to me. I originally wanted my dog to have a raincoat bc when she walks in the rain she kicks dirt and water onto her stomach area. It doesn't protect her stomach so still need to wash her down.. It's okay material looks good. wished it covered her stomach more though
customer_reviews.author: CelenaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made! "Patch " loved his new coat and we received it just in time for a rainstorm :) Great quality! As soon as we put it on him he snuggled into his bed and fell asleep , we think it is comforting/calming to him. The pockets ,snaps, zipper all great quality! Color beautiful bright yellow, the lining keeps him warm and it's such a cute color combination with the outer yellow , and I must say our pup looks so HAMDSOME! Thank you Ellie Dog Wear!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made but difficult to put on
customer_reviews.text: This is a great raincoat. It is well made and provides complete rain protection. And, it coincidentally matches one that I as a human own - right down to the striped lining. That being said, I'm not sure if I will keep it. It takes a long time to put on with the zipper on the bottom - just getting my dog to hold still until I zipper it can be a challenge. He also seems to feel very confined in it and doesn't like the his legs covered. Haven't tried to get him to go out in in yet, but not sure he will wear it so might have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Marshie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but too big
customer_reviews.text: It's very beautiful and very good quality but the measures are bigger than it says in the size chart. I bought an M size to my dachshund because it matched her measures but it ended up being too big. We're still being able to use it, though. When it rains her belly and chest used to get all dirty from the wet grass but not with this raincoat. The lining is not waterproof, though, and because of her short paws I had to flip the sleeves, so it gets wet and dirty more easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit a little small but FANTASTIC quality!
customer_reviews.text: Just exchanging for a larger size. My dog (a 68 pound Airedale Terrier) was within the XL measurements if the size chart but it was a little difficult putting his second leg into the jacket. Very well made garment. We are moving to the East Coast (from southern CA) so it rains a lot there. Can't wait to get the larger size. Very cute, very well made jacket. I will be using a second when my puppy gets to full size!!
customer_reviews.author: kramersmom

customer_reviews.title: but the length is perfect. The hood is useless because of its gigantic ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a 7lb Min Pin. Clothes are always hard to find for her because of her length. The Small coat fits her okay, a little big in the chest/stomach area, but the length is perfect. The hood is useless because of its gigantic size on my dog. Even though it can be tightened, it is too big. It will have come off so she can see. We haven't walked in the rain yet with it. It is of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ajay

customer_reviews.title: Cute but Functional Raincoat
customer_reviews.text: I have a 22 lb mini labradoodle and the size Medium was a perfect fit. According to the charts - with his neck and chest size I should have ordered a Small but I went a size up and I am glad I did. He looks so darn cute in it and in Seattle - a raincoat is a necessity! The zipper does get caught in his fur so I have to be careful there...but other than that I am pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Springs here and so are the rain storms! Fashion Forward & function  100%
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for commenting back when I asked about the measurements for my son. It was a little loose on the bottom but the fit was uncanny! The bungee cords added to this jacket a beautiful feature! For those who are double guessing because of the price point trust me when I say it's totally worth it! I have yet to see another raincoat on Amazon like this one for more inexpensive price. Buy it now before they sell out completely!!
customer_reviews.author: Bordiqua99

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding quality.
customer_reviews.text: Omg. We have purchased a lot of clothing over the past 8 months since we first got our chihuahua pup. Most items of clothing average around the $15 mark, so at about $35 dollars this garment is expensive. I wasn’t sure what to expect until the box arrived. This is by far the best made garment we have purchased so far. Super cute and the build quality is excellent from the zipper to the snaps to the pull strings. My hope is that this company expands its product line, so i will support them now with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: William C.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality - runs small!
customer_reviews.text: This raincoat is super adorable and is of excellent quality, but runs about two sizes smaller than it says on the sizing chart. I measured my pup and made ‘sure’ to order the right size as she’s small but with a long body (papillon/chihuahua mix). It is about 3 inches shy of hitting the base of her tail. Unfortunately it’s past the point of returning. So I’ll probably end up ordering another one
customer_reviews.author: KrisDub

customer_reviews.title: He’s kind of a big deal!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a small based on chest size, but it was a little small. Exchanged it for a medium and my 10 pound fur kiddo loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: Looks exactly as shown
customer_reviews.text: The first attractive large dog clothing I've seen. It looks and fits like a human's jacket. But it is however difficult to put on my German Shepherd. For the reason I wish the closure was on the top. That way I could slip it on easily. I'm still uncertain if I am going to keep it for this 1 reason.
customer_reviews.author: S. Killian

customer_reviews.title: Best raincoat for your dog!
customer_reviews.text: Finally found the perfect raincoat, The best part is it zippers up and snaps. Wish I found this years ago. Raincoats, with velcro straps under belly, were always sliding around on my dog. This raincoat also has a detachable hood and an opening for the leash. I got my 8 lb yorkie the small and it fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie w.

customer_reviews.title: It fits perfect and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: My pup is just too cute in this jacket! When I walked her in the rain I had people comment the whole time always saying she was adorable. It kept her body dry and it was even roomy enough to fit a little shirt for cooler days. The hood even covers her head although doesn't stay on well - she doesn't mind. My girl has a 13" chest and is 6lbs and the XS was just right. Quality is great - couldn't ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: Candy BTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: It's adorable and made well.
customer_reviews.text: When I first saw this raincoat, it was out of stock. I was so disappointed. But I wrote to the people at Ellie Wear and asked if they had more coming in. They did!... expected in just a few weeks. So, when it came back in stock, I bought it. I'm so glad that I was able to get one. It's perfect! It's adorable. And it's so well-made. The hood can snap on and off. The pockets on the back are so cute. And I love the blue and white striped lining. If you're even thinking about buying one, don't think. Just buy it. You'll love it.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Well made Ellie raincoat.
customer_reviews.text: I love the raincoat. It is cute as can be and fits well. He is 11 lbs so the small was fine. I haven’t tried it over his harness. If I had a complaint it is that the hood is too big. I realize small dogs have different size heads.
customer_reviews.author: Ann B Moody

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: I tried to buy this coat from a different seller on Amazon for much cheaper, and after 2 months and 2 incorrect orders the cost from then was poor quality and clearly a cheap duplicate. This one by far is better, it is actually accurate to the description and the material is great. I have a corgi that weighs 23lbs. and the medium fits well. The sleeves are a little long, but they look and work great rolled up. Save yourself the hassle and frustration, buy this coat If you seriously want one.
customer_reviews.author: abby cook

customer_reviews.title: Cute! Well-made! So much detail! Great find!
customer_reviews.text: I love this raincoat! It's well-made with lots of detail. However, I do need to exchange for another size and Amazon has made it easy to return and, hopefully, receive a replacement soon as it's raining cats & dogs here right now! -- 'Will post another review when everything is sorted out and include a picture so you can see my sweet pup in her new rainwear.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Goulding

customer_reviews.title: Great raincoat if it fit properly
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about this raincoat, since I'm always looking for one that covers my dog's armpits since he's hairy. The raincoat is so cute. The zipper is hard to zip up and we usually use the buttons. The design is darling and the material keeps him warm and dry. However the sizing for these coats are little off. My dog is usually a size 14 or a S/M depending on the manufacturer. These jackets are weird. The Medium size was WAY too big and the small is a tight fit and doesn't cover 13 inches. Therefore the dog's bottom gets all wet and isn't covered. The sizing isn't very accurate.
customer_reviews.author: appamomma

customer_reviews.title: High quality material, keeps him warm too
customer_reviews.text: Impressed at how thick and sturdy the material is, like a human raincoat. I sized this for a medium for the Yorkiepoo, even though his neck & chest measurements could have taken the smaller size, his back met he Medium sizing, and glad I did since the coat seems more natural with some extra space. Also appreciate that even though it goes down to his tail, there is still room for him to go #1 without hitting the coat.
customer_reviews.author: RAL

customer_reviews.title: Great raincoat!
customer_reviews.text: Love love This! He gets checked out by passerby! We couldn't zip it up all the way which is fine since it still gives him protection from the rain. He is about 63lbs & we got him XL. Seems well made with quality material.
customer_reviews.author: 206area

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: The raincoat is made very well. The length of the back is perfect for both of my pups and the front paw length is perfect too!! I haven't taken them in the rain yet, but I feel like they'll have better coverage with this raincoat! 15 pound Shihpoo size medium and 10 pound Shihpoo size small
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute but not water proof
customer_reviews.text: Very cute coat, received a lot of wonderful comments from many people as to how good it looks on my 6 pounder (xs). The fit is perfect but it is not water proof. Water does go through the first layer so that why it only received a 3 star.
customer_reviews.author: standardnut

customer_reviews.title: Puppy Raincoat
customer_reviews.text: This little raincoat is so cute and very well made. It has a hood with drawstring, a zipper and snaps on the body section with a drawstring. It fit my 15 pound puppy very well. It will take her a few walks to get accustomed to it.
customer_reviews.author: gr8cook

customer_reviews.title: Functional & fashionable with Comfort
customer_reviews.text: This is fabulous and adorable!! It covers my dog but not bulky or flimsy...just right. The hood is great and comfortable for her too. Love the black and white striped inner lining. Love the zipper and snaps. The sleeves are great too. Its perfect! Comfortable, will keep her dry and from getting a chill and its so fashionable...she looks so cute. I wish it would rain!!!
customer_reviews.author: Julianne L

customer_reviews.title: A great rain slicker for dogs
customer_reviews.text: This is like an authentic yellow rain slicker people would wear - except it is for dogs. it has a hood, zipper and snap closing, and a cute llllittle black and white lining. I bought it for my "grand dog" it it is great!
customer_reviews.author: Customer is Always Right

customer_reviews.title: Love it! It looks amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It looks amazing, and it's of good quality and well made. I have a four years old Shiba Inu, and I first bought him an M, but then I had to change it to an L. It fits fine, and I can tell my dog is confortable in it.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Perez Balverdi

customer_reviews.title: Watch sizing carefully
customer_reviews.text: Order was filled quickly. I used the sizing guidelines appropriately but the raincoat was very tight and undersized. I have started a return with the intention of ordering the next size up. This is a well-made product.
customer_reviews.author: M. Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, sized poorly
customer_reviews.text: Dog clothes are inconsistently sized to begin with, but I know to use my dog's measurements to size clothes. Material and quality are great. Size is a miss. It fit in the body, but this raincoat is too narrow around the chest, even measured correctly. It wouldn't zip up the whole way.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Helgesen

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! My dog is half Chihuahua and half terrier and can be hard to fit. She wouldn't go to the bathroom in the rain and this did the trick. It's a very cute raincoat and great material. Love the stripes with the yellow. I wish they made one for adults. She doesn't like the head part and it doesn't stay well but she doesn't seem to mind getting rain there. I followed the size guide and got a large and it was too large. The medium is perfect though!
customer_reviews.author: friendly

customer_reviews.title: Cute, well made, good belly coverage.
customer_reviews.text: Really cute. I like the belly coverage. My dog has short legs and his belly gets really dirty. If your dog is between sizes, go up a size, as there are no stretch panels to accommodate fit. My dog doesn't like the hood, so I'm glad that snaps off.
customer_reviews.author: kojak

customer_reviews.title: Such good quality— cutest addition to a pup wardrobe
customer_reviews.text: This rain jacket is absolutely pawfect! The quality of the jacket is so good, i think it may even be better quality than my raincoat. It is thick enough to give warmth but not too bulky where it’s difficult to put on. The zipper closure is everything, since my dog is kinda muscular, she is able to pop out of Velcro and snaps, this jacket thought of that which is great! The pocket and hood just make my border collie/ Shepard/ Doberman mix, even cuter than she originally was. I ordered a size L for my 35 pound mut and it fits great. Definitely take the time to measure your dog to get the accurate size.
customer_reviews.author: C.Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Darling little raincoat and well made
customer_reviews.text: I bought this raincoat for my bichon frise. It is beautifully made with lovely details - placket, zipper, snaps, pockets. It is a little difficult to get on-I need to roll her over on her back to zip it up and snap the snaps. The hood falls over her eyes and needs to be rolled back. I wish it was a little longer but all in all I think it is a great little raincoat and I am happy with my purchase. I especially like that it covers some of her belly and keeps it dry.
customer_reviews.author: mrsjras

customer_reviews.title: It fits better and my puppy looks really cute
customer_reviews.text: This is very well made rain jacket. I received my puppy's jacket was too large, and I returned it , meanwhile I ordered smaller size. It fits better and my puppy looks really cute. Over all the service was very quick.
customer_reviews.author: Soonah

customer_reviews.title: Sizing chart is inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: This is very well constructed, however, I believe the sizing chart is off. We have a 9 month old Golden Retriever. We ordered an XL based on the sizing recommendations. He has a 30" chest. We can barely get the coat closed. I really wish this came in XXL as I'd love to have it for him. I just can't give a positive rating because sizing charts for online shopping is crucial.
customer_reviews.author: Grammy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Georgie Approved!
customer_reviews.text: This is super high-quality. I ordered a size bigger for my dog (she's 28" around the chest) so I had room for her harness. I'm glad I did. She's Georgie from IT for Halloween. She got used to the coat really quickly too.
customer_reviews.author: Anim8DesignIllustr8

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and length for us! Real show stopper on a wet day.
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough regarding how perfect this raincoat is for us! It did not take long for us to get the chance to use it, living in the south with how often it rains here, the coat did just it's job and more! We had so many people stop us at the Outlet Mall and express how they would love to have one of their own! The sizing was very true to the size they list, the back comes right to my dog's tail without being too short on his belly! I highly reccomend, I have my sights on the Ellie Dog Wear Raincoat in Blue next!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon McDonnell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and style
customer_reviews.text: Excellent raincoat. I have bought a few and returned them. The quality of this and the style is exactly what is needed in a dog raincoat. High quality zipper (not Velcro), covers his front legs, and his belly! He is protected from the wet and muddy! Exactly what a raincoat is supposed to do but only one I have found that does it. Fantastic product and my dog put it on immediately and no hassles or complaint from him. He loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Need more in between sizes
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this coat is great but the sizing wasn't. I've been searching for a coat like this without velcro and with arms for my 15 pound beagle/pekingese mix and found the small to be too small to fit comfortably over her harness and the medium was way too big. It is so unfortunate that there aren't more sizes for those dogs that are in between.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: ADOREABLE
customer_reviews.text: Love this raincoat!!! I bought this for my Mini Australian Shepard and she is about 30 lbs. The large fit her perfectly. This rain coat is so cute and practical. I bought this so she can be Georgie from IT for Halloween but she will be using this in the rain also. I wish I could get a raincoat like this for myself!
customer_reviews.author: ab2588

customer_reviews.title: This coat is EVERYTHING
customer_reviews.text: I was iffy about spending $30 on this coat but I am glad I did. The coat is just perfect, the inside and outer liner is made from quality material. I wish all pet clothing was as good as this. I bought an XL for my 5 month old pit but it was too big for him. I then bought a L and it fit better, I decided to keep both sizes as I don't know how much bigger he'll get.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Really well made product!
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this product 5 stars for quality which is exceptional. I first ordered a medium for my dogs (two miniature schnauzers) and the coats arrived and nearly swallowed them up! I chose to order the small because they were so well made and it arrived and is too small. Unfortunately I can't use this raincoat because there is too much difference in just one size. Disappointing for me but I'm sure others will really love this jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size M fits a Westie, so adorable!
customer_reviews.text: This raincoat is adorable and of good quality. I originally purchased a size large for my Westie, but it was too big so I returned it and purchased a size medium (see photo). I had to pay $7:25 to return the large size, but other than that I am completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this coat
customer_reviews.text: I love this coat. It's so well made and sturdy. I've bought dozens of raincoats for my dog, most of them are flimsy and cheap looking in person. This one really exceeded my expectations. It has so many adorable details and fits great. I highly recommend it. My dog weighs 20 pounds and the medium fits him perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Svetlana

customer_reviews.title: Better made than most human's raincoats
customer_reviews.text: There's a reason this dog raincoat costs so much more than most of the other ones I've seen. It's so well made! It's got snap buttons, a zipper, bungee drawstrings, pockets (why a dog needs pockets, I have no idea), and the cutest striped lining. Can't wait for the next rainstorm!
customer_reviews.author: Patty Lin

customer_reviews.title: Stains won't come out, but extremely cute otherwise
customer_reviews.text: I bought an XS for my 14lb petite pug. Her dimensions are: Neck 13in (33.02 cm), Chest: 17in (43.18 cm) Back: 15 in (38.1 cm). Her neck is a bit too girth-y for the XS for we leave it a bit unzipped. But she looks ridiculously adorable. My only issue is that the underside of the coat had mud/dirt stains that does not wash off at all.
customer_reviews.author: DKC

customer_reviews.title: Recommend sizing up
customer_reviews.text: Adorable raincoat for my little guy 💕, who detests going out in the rain. For reference, my schnauzer is slightly chubby at 21pounds and according to his measurements, is in-between the size small and the medium. I sized up to a medium, which turned out to be a good idea as it fit perfect (maybe even a tad tight in the chest area). I would recommend sizing up. Quality seems great and will hopefully be durable. Arrived just in time for the upcoming week of nonstop rain 🌧️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made but would not fit all dogs
customer_reviews.text: It is a very well made piece of dog clothing. But I believe it would fit some specific dogs. I ordered S for my Pekingese mix pup and it fitted weird. She is short legged with a long back; the chest closed nicely but the length of the jacket covered just half of her back. When she wakes it wrinkled around armpits and got even shorter. My dog hated it. But she looked suuuper cute. I give the jacket 4 starts because I think it’s is not universal, but the quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect raincoat!
customer_reviews.text: My 14lb longhaired Dachshund looks fabulous in it! Size S fits him very well (neck 10in / chest 17in) and he doesn’t seem to have an issue walking around. The material and build is very good quality. You can tell that they put a lot of love into this coat!
customer_reviews.author: PurchasePanda

customer_reviews.title: Cuteness Overload!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this raincoat for my little Maltese. He’s 9.5 lbs and size Small fits him beautifully. I’m pleased with the quality, design and style. He looks so adorable in his new coat! It’s pricey but in this case it meets my expectations. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Scorpiosgirl

customer_reviews.title: I exchanged the medium for a small and it fits perfect! I love this raincoat
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest little raincoat that I have ever seen! Very well made and fits well, runs a little big. I bought a medium for my 12lb Chihuahua and it was too large. I exchanged the medium for a small and it fits perfect! I love this raincoat !
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia W.

customer_reviews.title: So zazzy!🤩
customer_reviews.text: Well-made and so very cute. Had to return the small (my 7.5-8lb dog's usual size) because it was huge. Exchanged for XS and it fits perfectly! The sizing chart seems to be accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu Planks

customer_reviews.title: Measure with Harness on!
customer_reviews.text: I would suggest measuring your dog with their harness on, but the material is amazing, easy to wash, super stylish, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: James P.

customer_reviews.title: The best thing about it is the excellent coverage
customer_reviews.text: The best thing about it is the excellent coverage, both below and on top. The only shortcoming for our dog (a low-slung Bichon) was that the front leg openings were somewhat restricting. We corrected that by cutting the opening and adding Velcro strips.
customer_reviews.author: EverEddie

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket but check sizing
customer_reviews.text: Well made , very cute. XL fit one of my dogs really well but not the other. If you are buying for a larger dog I would say this jacket fits best up to 60lbs max. It would be great if the company could add a XXL size.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest dog raincoat I’ve ever seen. Fits like a real jacket not just a silly poncho or cape design. I have a 23 lb Frenchie and going off of the sizing chart, I originally ordered a size large. However when it came in it it hung too far down his back, even after fully tightening the rear adjustment cables. I’ve since ordered a size medium and it fits him perfectly. Can’t wait for it to rain now so we can show it off :)
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Strange dimensions
customer_reviews.text: The raincoat was super high quality and I was excited to try it on my standard-sized corgi! However, the neck was WAY too tight and the belly was WAY too loose to the point where my corgi got her front legs stuck inside the raincoat and fell over. If I got a bigger size to accommodate her neck, the belly would just be even bigger than this size. I really wanted to like this raincoat, but I'll have to go with another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Turrentine

customer_reviews.title: My dog is now better dressed than I am
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is SO CUTE, and the quality is honestly fantastic. I ordered the x small for my cavachon, and it makes rainy walks much less of a painful experience for both of us. My only complaints are that the pockets on the x small size are TINY, and I don’t really think I could fit anything in them, even small treats. Also, the hood is much to small to cover her head well, despite the body of the jacket fitting perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: You’ll need lots of patience
customer_reviews.text: Ultimately, my wife and I found the raincoat for our dog, much too difficult to put on her. Having the closing zipper and snaps on the underside, made it a struggle to hold the dog still, insert her legs in the sleeves, and finally secure it. We’re older and can’t handle all the bending over.
customer_reviews.author: Richard M.

customer_reviews.title: Very High Quality Rain Jacket
customer_reviews.text: The size runs small, but finally got the right size for my dog. She looked adorable with the raincoat ! The lining and material were really well made, I'm impressed of the highly crafted stitches and quality :)
customer_reviews.author: Jin Jessica Yang

customer_reviews.title: Well made and adorable!
customer_reviews.text: This is too cute! Our dog is about 11 lbs and we ordered a small and it fits perfectly! It is very well made and we can’t wait to use it for rainy days and as part of his Halloween outfit (Georgie).
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Love this, really good quality! The hood is a little big for him but not a big deal. Doesn’t go to the bathroom outside in the rain without it...lol
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Most adorable and quality-made coat!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously the best doggy jacket ever! This is a high quality coat! There is a nice, soft lining and the details are impeccable! I have a 25lb mini poodle and he wears a Large.
customer_reviews.author: Peanut Butter

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Well Made!
customer_reviews.text: We followed the measurements and bought a little big, and it still was too small. In all fairness, it may have been the shape of our dog! It was super cute and appeared extremely well made and durable! We had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our fur nephew, and he looks absolutely adorable in it! Good weight/material. Seems to be durable. We have not been able to try it out in the rain yet but know he'll be the most stylish pup out there
customer_reviews.author: BSatt

customer_reviews.title: Quality dog raincoat
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality coat. I like that the hood is detachable. I am not so sure how easily it will be to zip up under the belly but there are also snaps so if you are in a rush then you can just use the snaps.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Naese

customer_reviews.title: We love this raincoat for our french bulldog
customer_reviews.text: We love this raincoat for our french bulldog! It's great quality, a lot of attention to detail in the coat- even functioning pockets. Very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret R.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Golden!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this rain coat!! It’s super cute!! I got an XL for my 50lb golden retriever. I can’t get over how adorable she looks. Now we don’t have to get soaked in the Seattle rain!! 😎
customer_reviews.author: Kia Miller

customer_reviews.title: Coat is cuter than my own rain coat.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the XLarge is just a little too small for my 6 month old Goldendoodle, other than that we love the coat. My oldest daughter complained that the dog's rain coat was cuter than her's. Very well made, good quality product. Just wish it came in an XX Large.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: The BEST dog raincoat
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this little raincoat extremely well made and does it’s intended purpose perfectly, it’s literally the cutest thing ever. Just do yourself a favor and buy this. You won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: So adorable, and easy to put on and thankfully she doesn't get bother by it. Additionally the material is nice and doesn't make her feel itchy or constricted.
customer_reviews.author: Katana2199

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved the raincoat, but my female frenchie looked like Gordon the fisherman in the yellow. Gifted to a friend with a boy dog and he looks amazing in it. Just repurchased it in pink
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: It looks great but a bit short around the neck
customer_reviews.text: This looks amazing, it gets the job done, the neck area does not seem to have been designed for powerful breeds so you have to leave it open, that would be the one improvement I would do. We got a 2XL
customer_reviews.author: Joe Cool

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of this product and the high end materials used. Well worth the money. I see this lasting many years. And he looks so handsome in it.
customer_reviews.author: A. MacInnes

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Functional!
customer_reviews.text: This rain jacket is really cute and looks adorable. It also does a great job keeping my sweet Riley dry and the hood stays on really well. We are pleased with her jacket! For sizing, she is 13 inches long and I ordered an Extra Small. There's a few inches (maybe two) of her back not covered, but I think the small would have been too big.
customer_reviews.author: ELIZABETH F

customer_reviews.title: Yellow zip up rain coat for dog
customer_reviews.text: Well made coat, nice design & fit well. Tried it on the pup, he looks so adorable in it and not resent having it on. Waiting for a rain day to see how well it keep him dry.
customer_reviews.author: Mikki

customer_reviews.title: Cute jacket
customer_reviews.text: Cute rain jacket but the arms are short and the the cost didn’t go all way to the tail and I have a small dog
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect rain jacket!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly the best doggy rain jacket I’ve purchased. My pup is a chug (chi pug mix), 20lbs (cough 23 lbs), 17” long & a medium true to size for him.
customer_reviews.author: elleboogie

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely adorable and excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a really good quality raincoat for our walks as it gets rainy out and this was the perfect one! It's better quality than some of my own coats and Steak looks adorable in it! Even though she isn't a big fan of wearing it! Can't wait to check out some of the other Ellie Dog Wear items!
customer_reviews.author: Steak the Corgi

customer_reviews.title: Roccoluca looks so adorable and it keeps him dry
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, bright yellow on my little black havapoo. Rain runs off the slicker material. Arrived as described.
customer_reviews.author: Churchill

customer_reviews.title: Good quality materials, well made, has useful hole for the lead behind the neck area.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my little Pom dry when he rushes around in the rain. Good quality materials, well made, has useful hole for the lead behind the neck area.
customer_reviews.author: C0d3r.N3T

customer_reviews.title: caution on size
customer_reviews.text: Love the raincoat, I needed to order an XL and company was very easy to work with. I have not used in rain yet but do not foresee any problems. thanks Ellie Dog for being so great to work with!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great Raincoat for a Dog that Loves Rain
customer_reviews.text: Great raincoat! But my dog is sized weird, so the length isn’t quite right (too short) though the neck and chest fit great. Very cute style (much better than anything else I’ve seen)!
customer_reviews.author: Joe B.

customer_reviews.title: Best quality I have seen!
customer_reviews.text: High quality rain coat is good fit for our Maltese. Sturdy zipper and stainless snap buttons add additional protection. Very satisfied and highly recommend this high end dog wear.
customer_reviews.author: David K

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: It was too tight, returned for a larger size and received another medium
customer_reviews.author: Luve

customer_reviews.title: nice coat
customer_reviews.text: We liked the coat for our Bichon. It was tight around the middle tho, measured correctly & length was good. I felt the size med ran a bit smaller than it said. Nicely made & cute on the dog!
customer_reviews.author: patricia wells

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works great
customer_reviews.text: Love the raincoat. Really keeps my pup dry (where it’s covered). Now I need to find my pup rain boots.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Sooo cute
customer_reviews.text: Very adorable!! A little snug even after I did measurements but it isn't terrible
customer_reviews.author: undero

customer_reviews.title: There should have been dimensions for each size.
customer_reviews.text: It was too big for my dog. There were no dimensions on the ad for this product so I had to guess the size. I returned it today. Also, your first rating above was not complete. I had no idea what you were asking.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Reed

customer_reviews.title: Although Henry (Cavalier King Charles) was not in love having to wear it- he looked extremely cute
customer_reviews.text: Very cute raincoat! Although Henry (Cavalier King Charles) was not in love having to wear it- he looked extremely cute!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny E.

customer_reviews.title: This is a darling rain coat except it runs small ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a darling rain coat except it runs small. The material does not give. I ordered an extra small and I should have ordered a small.
customer_reviews.author: jb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a 10 pound maltese and the small fit him perfectly! It is made very well
customer_reviews.author: katrina d'souza

customer_reviews.title: Great product with nice tummy coverage
customer_reviews.text: Great product with nice tummy coverage. Looks really cute. Would suggest a velcro tab on the back of the hood for times when you might want the hood and don't want to snap it off but don't need it covering the dogs head. Sizing--I have a Shih Tzu and the medium fit perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Jupiterrising

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Very high quality. Bought a medium for my 9 month old Corgi.
customer_reviews.author: Tiff

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: It's absolutely adorable and my dog happily wears it. The large perfectly fits my cocker spaniel and the hood is a cute design feature though not practical, but it could be his ears. Keeps him dry and protects his chest making it perfect, especially for my shaggy pup.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Fits my dog perfectly, she weights 35lbs (size: ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits my dog perfectly, she weights 35lbs (size: Large). Tiny bit of extra room I guess but her old jacket was uncomfortable. She gets tons of compliments on it and wont go out in the rain without it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric D. Ludwig

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: It fits both of my dogs even though the one in the yellow the female is a tad bit smaller than medium.
customer_reviews.author: R.

customer_reviews.title: Cute coat but was too heavy for my 6 pound ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute coat but was too heavy for my 6 pound chihuahua. She often wears coats/vests, but she clearly found it difficult to move in this item.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M.

customer_reviews.title: A great find
customer_reviews.text: We have yet to see how this rain jacket performs in the rain, but we love the look and fit of it. We bought this coat a little big for our puppy to grow in to. And the price was great. We would recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bock

customer_reviews.title: Cute and worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this quality and design. A bit upsetting that it doesn’t quiet zip up all the way yet the rest of the jacket is loose but other than that it’s great
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Castaneda

product_meta.title: Ellie Dog Wear Yellow Zip Up Dog Raincoat with Reflective Buttons, Pockets, Rain/Water Resistant, Adjustable Drawstring, Removable Hood - Size XXS to XXL - Stylish Premium Dog Raincoats
feature_bullets: ✔️ DOUBLE LAYERED DESIGN - Double layered zip up raincoat with additional buttons makes putting this coat on easy as well as adjustable and stylish.
✔️ WATER RESISTANT - Completely water resistant and will keep your dog safe and dry in all weather conditions.
✔️ MULTIPLE POCKET DESIGN - Our dog raincoats comes with multiple buttoned pockets for easy storage of small items and also includes a removable hoodie.
✔️ HARNESS & ADJUSTABLE FRIENDLY - Contains a small opening on the upper back of the rain jacket for harness users. Made adjustable to fit any dog breed
✔️ QUALITY INSPECTED - Are you worried about ordering products from China? Our products have been inspected by a reputable third party for quality assurance. No compromise on material and quality.
